page.title: 15GAMES CHILDREN PLAY (b)
page.content: Another game played by children, mainly the girls, is 'French Skipping'.At least three players are needed for this game. Also a large length of elastic which has the ends joined or tied, forming a continuous loop. Two people stand with the elastic round their legs and the elastic extended, a third person jumps from one end to the other, placing their feet on the elastic to hold it on to the floor with each jump at the same time singing the song 'bay scout walk out'. If the person jumping misses putting the elastic to the floor with either foot then they take the place of one of the people holding the elastic around their legs - and so the game goes on.
